## CardType enum

Enumerates supported card types.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare enum CardType 
```

## Enumeration Members

|  Member | Value | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  Contact | <code>1</code> | A smartcard. |
|  Contactless | <code>2</code> | A contactless card. |
|  Proximity | <code>4</code> | A proximity card. |
